pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Antigravity is Google's next-generation AI-driven code editor and IDE built on VSCode OSS 1.104.0 with Electron 37.3.1. It provides advanced code intelligence, integrated development tools, and extensive language support for modern software development.
Features include: - AI-powered code completion and suggestions - Advanced IntelliSense and language servers - Integrated debugging tools - Git integration with diff viewer - Extension marketplace support - GPU-accelerated rendering (Vulkan/OpenGL) - Multi-language support (40+ languages) - Terminal integration
